title: Mobile Architect
jobDescription:
As an IBM Application Architect, you directly help clients transform their business and solve complex problems. You will define the scope and vision for projects that deliver customized solutions using your knowledge of IBM platforms. You are a technical leader, serving as a liaison among business partners, technical resources, and project stakeholders.

Your Role and Responsibilities
As an IBM Application Architect, you directly help clients transform their business and solve complex problems. You will define the scope and vision for projects that deliver customized solutions using your knowledge of IBM platforms. You are a technical leader, serving as a liaison among business partners, technical resources, and project stakeholders.
Your Role and Responsibilities :

Responsible for providing solutions to optimize performance, availability and scalability of the applications, and maintains the functional interface to the application infrastructure.

Who you are:
  • Accomplished technology professional with 8-10 years of expertise in the development and design of mobile applications for both Android and iOS platforms, adept in both Native and Hybrid environments. Ideally, possess proficiency in Cordova frameworks
What you'll do:
  • Innovate and design architectural solutions tailored to meet our clients' needs, drawing upon your extensive experience in mobile application development and design. Serve as a guiding force within the team, providing support and solutions to overcome challenges in the implementation process.


Required Technical and Professional Expertise
  • Education Qualification - B.Tech B.E/ MCA MSc IT
  • 8-10 years of experience, Designs Mobile applications which may run on multiple platforms and composed of multiple software packages.
  • Responsible for providing solutions to optimize performance, availability and scalability of the applications, and maintains the functional interface to the application infrastructure.


Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
  • Experience in Mobile Application technologies like Java, Cordova, ionic, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Angular JS etc.

title: Mobile App Developer ( Flutter )
jobDescription:
Programming Design Role : Mobile App Developer (Flutter) Employment Type: Full Time Experience: 1 to 3 years Navi Mumbai

Job Summary
  • As a Flutter Developer, you will create multi-platform apps for iOS and Android using Googles Flutter development framework.
  • The primary focus will be on creating new experiences and maintaining the acclaimed app. You will additionally work on innovative new app projects as well as internally incubated ventures.
  • Deep experience contributing to and managing high-scale production mobile apps. You must have previous experience in Flutter development.


Required Skills
  • Dedicated experience on Flutter platform (for android and iOS) required.
  • Design and Build sophisticated and highly scalable apps using Flutter (for android and iOS).
  • Good knowledge about Dart amd Handling Native Android and IOS views in Flutter app.
  • Experience with Server API calls from mobile app.
  • Experience with using Animation classes in flutter.
  • Integration experience with crash analytics, Firebase messaging, Firebase analytics.
  • Skilled with using flutter packages, Obfuscation and integrating with native and web SDK.
  • Perform time profiling and memory leaks assessment.
  • Performance Tuning of flutter apps.
  • Experience with Git source management.


Required Qualification
  • B. Sc/B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization or advanced degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
